error.message: The "app.root" service is deprecated in drupal:9.0.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use the app.root parameter instead. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3080612

Class Drupal\sfc\TwigComponentLoader implements deprecated interface Twig\Loader\ExistsLoaderInterface: since Twig 2.7, to be removed in 3.0
Class Drupal\sfc\TwigExtension extends deprecated class Twig_Extension: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Extension\AbstractExtension" instead
The 'sfc_dev/main' library is not defined because the defining extension is not installed. Cannot decide if it is deprecated or not.

The drupal/core requirement is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal. Either remove it or update it to be compatible. See https://drupal.org/node/2514612#s-drupal-9-compatibility.
